function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High NPL/L ratios in ASEAN countries","Impact":"Increased risk of loan defaults and financial instability","Mitigation":"Implement strict credit guarantee ratios based on bank creditworthiness","Technologies":"Credit scoring models, risk assessment software","People":"Governments, banks","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Inconsistent credit guarantee ratios for banks","Impact":"Moral hazard and financial instability","Mitigation":"Vary guarantee ratios based on bank creditworthiness","Technologies":"Data analytics, creditworthiness assessment tools","People":"Governments, banks","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Reliability of econometric equations","Impact":"Potential inaccuracies in assessing loan default risk","Mitigation":"Conduct robustness checks using econometric equations","Technologies":"Econometric modeling software, statistical analysis tools","People":"Economists, statisticians","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
